plot outline: Adinath Kothare as Aditya and Neha Pendse as Antara a young Couple. Aditya(Adinath Kothare) loves Antara(Neha Pendse) a lot. A morning comes where Aditya(Adinath Kothare) wakes to find that Antara(Neha Pendse) had gone. Here begins his journey as he tries to unravel why his woman left him on the morning after his wedding? As he tries to fulfill the promise he makes to his grandmother that he will bring her back!. When he comes to know the reasons behind Antara(Neha Pendse) being disappear he get shocked!!! What is the suspense behind Antara's disappearance? Who is cheating Aditya? Does Antara really love Aditya? Why Gangsters are behind Aditya? Follow their hilarious journey as they find their way to that bike on her wedding day and see how they deal with the mobster's who stand between them, to know, if true love can overcome greed and still create a 'happily ever after'.
title: Premasathi Coming Suun
plot: _Premasathi Coming Suun_ (qv) is a 2014 Marathi comedy about Aditya (Adinath Kothare), a young man in his early twenties who's family is looking for a bride for him, and Antara (Neha Pendse), the prospective bride with a hidden agenda.

Adinath Kothare as Aditya and Neha Pendse as Antara a young Couple. Aditya(Adinath Kothare) loves Antara(Neha Pendse) a lot. A morning comes where Aditya(Adinath Kothare) wakes to find that Antara(Neha Pendse) had gone. Here begins his journey as he tries to unravel why his woman left him on the morning after his wedding? As he tries to fulfill the promise he makes to his grandmother that he will bring her back!. When he comes to know the reasons behind Antara(Neha Pendse) being disappear he get shocked!!! What is the suspense behind Antara's disappearance? Who is cheating Aditya? Does Antara really love Aditya? Why Gangsters are behind Aditya? Follow their hilarious journey as they find their way to that bike on her wedding day and see how they deal with the mobster's who stand between them, to know, if true love can overcome greed and still create a 'happily ever after'.
